title: Baseline file is ignored when `--diff` option is used
body:
Given that I have a project with configured Psalm and error baseline path, when I run analysis I don't see any errors:

```
-> % dc exec php vendor/bin/psalm --show-info=false                  
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░  60 / 304 (20%)
░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░ 120 / 304 (39%)
░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░ 180 / 304 (59%)
░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░ 240 / 304 (79%)
░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░ 300 / 304 (99%)
░░░░

------------------------------
No errors found!
------------------------------

Checks took 22.50 seconds and used 551.933MB of memory
Psalm was able to infer types for 90.9964% of the codebase
```

However when I change one file and run analysis with `--diff` I see more errors than newly introduced ones:

```
-> % dc exec php vendor/bin/psalm --show-info=false --diff
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

░░

ERROR: InvalidReturnType - common/Yii.php:14:28 - The declared return type 'int' for Yii::foo is incorrect, got 'string'
    public function foo(): int {

ERROR: InvalidReturnStatement - common/Yii.php:15:16 - The type 'string(bar)' does not match the declared return type 'int' for Yii::foo
        return 'bar';

(OTHER ISSUES FROM THIS FILE, IGNORED THROUGH BASELINE FILE)

------------------------------
6 errors found
------------------------------

Checks took 3.45 seconds and used 276.309MB of memory
Psalm was able to infer types for 90.9566% of the codebase
```

This seems like a bug. All errors should be displayed only if `--ignore-baseline` option is provided.
